Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Friend \Friend\, v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Friended}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Friending}.] To act as the friend of; to favor; to countenance; to befriend. [Obs.] [1913 Webster]
Fortune friends the bold. --Spenser. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Friended \Friend"ed\, a. 1. Having friends; [Obs.] [1913 Webster]
2. Inclined to love; well-disposed. [Obs.] --Shak. [1913 Webster]
